product_name: Native Eyewear Apres Polarized Reflex Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Shield your eyes from sun and glare in retro-inspired style. The Native Eyewear Apres Polarized Reflex Sunglasses with reflective lenses can handle all your adventures over snow, water or land.
